trans-unit.source: Represents the models workflows using the familiar flowchart paradigm.
trans-unit.target: Representa os fluxos de trabalho de modelos que usam o paradigma de fluxograma familiar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity allows free-form creation of a workflow using nodes and links.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade permite a criação de forma livre de um fluxo de trabalho usando nós e links.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> objects contained by the flowchart.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> contida pelo fluxograma.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> objects..
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> to be executed when the flowchart starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> a ser executado quando o fluxograma inicia.

trans-unit.source: The starting node.
trans-unit.target: O nó inicial.

trans-unit.source: There must only be one <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart.StartNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Deve haver apenas um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart.StartNode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates configuring the StartNode of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como configurar o StartNode de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unconnected nodes are validated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os nós filho desconectados são validados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unconnected nodes are validated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se nós desconectados são validadas; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" />, which are available to share state across the child activities contained within the Flowchart.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> associados ao <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" /> que estão disponível para compartilhar o estado entre as atividades filho contidas no Fluxograma.

trans-unit.source: The collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de variáveis.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using Variables in a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar variáveis em um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [tratamento de falhas em um fluxograma atividade usando TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) exemplo.
